授業方法: IMPORTANT NOTICE: This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note: assignments will be posted on LUNA throughout the term, along with important announcements about the course, including which lectures are in person and which are online. It is therefore critical that students *log in to LUNA regularly* during this course.

第1回:
Introduction: Course Overview, Key Concepts 
No Written Assignment Due

This course has a heavy weekly reading load, and reading assignments must be completed before coming to class each week. There are also several writing assignments that must completed outside of class. Plagiarism or turning in assignments written by generative software (e.g. Chat GPT) will result in an F for the course.
第2回:
Ancient Greece: From Pericles to Alexander, Part I 
No Written Assignment Due
Reading assignment: de Soete, The Limits of Interpretation and Thucydides, pp. 33-41.

This course has a heavy weekly reading load, and reading assignments must be completed before coming to class each week. 評価.教科書Required texts0:
Reading assignments are from the three following sources, which are available from the SIS Library (on the Second Floor of the G Building):

Francois de Soete, “The Limits of Interpretation and Thucydides: An Analysis of Realist Themes in the History of the Peloponnesian War,” The Journal of International Studies 13 (2024): 33-47.
https://kwansei.repo.nii.ac.jp/records/2000246

Francois de Soete, “From a Kingdom of Gold to One of Iron and Rust: Political Violence and the Fall of the Roman Empire,” Kwansei Gakuin University Humanities Review 26 (2021): 87-106.
https://kwansei.repo.nii.ac.jp/records/30114

Joshua Cole and Carol Symes, Western Civilizations (20e Combined Volume).
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）

成績評価Grading2: Six weekly written assignments on LUNA
